snippet.title: Code Arcturus Gameplay Trailer | Available now on Steam
snippet.description:
Available now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1264410/Code_Arcturus/

Code Arcturus is a retro inspired arcade-style action platformer, with aliens, robots, spikes, explosions, and lots of coins. Blast your way through levels, compete for the fastest times on the leaserboards in Speedrun mode, or put your skills to the ultimate test in Nerfed mode!

Follow me on Twitter for announcements, updates and rants: https://twitter.com/eNorby

Designed and Developed by 
Norbert Érsek: https://twitter.com/eNorby

Graphics by
Will Tice: https://twitter.com/untiedgames
Luis Zuno: https://twitter.com/ansimuz

Music by 
Andrey Sitkov: https://twitter.com/andrewsitkov

Sound Effects by
Cafofo Music: https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/16881
Red Sky Sounds: https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/12739

Developed in Unity 2019.3
